name: action-sf-cicd
description: This is a github action to assist in automating Salesforce deployment. It leverages sfdx and [sfpowerkit](https://github.com/dxatscale/sfpowerkit) to enable 2 main workflows: 1. Validate potential changes against a CI sandbox when a pull request is created or updated. 2. Automatically deploy changes to a CI sandbox when a pull request is merged.
